name: DayDreamers
description:
After a mysterious mass-text message from a sender code-named: “DayDreamer” goes viral, a group of friends embark on a digital hunt for answers, not sure where it will lead them. One thing is for sure, however...everyone is involved.

Controls:  

Click to interact with the phone.

type in your password using your keyboard.
